    • Method Detail

      • calcComputerMove

        void calcComputerMove()
        Calculates the copmuter's move and updates the game board.

      • updatePlayerMove

        boolean updatePlayerMove​(GameBoard.GameMove move)
        Updates the player's move on the board. in case the move is not legal - nothing is done.
        Parameters:
        move - - the player's move
        Returns:
        true if the move is legal and false otherwise

      • getGameState

        IGameAlgo.GameState getGameState​(GameBoard.GameMove move)
        Parameters:
        move - - the last move made
        Returns:
        the game state: PLAYER_WON \ PLAYER_LOST \ TIE \ IN PROGRESS

      • getBoardState

        char[][] getBoardState()
        Returns:
        the game board state (each cell's content)
